name: christmas bookshelf mosaic blanket
notes:
*this christmas bookshelf blanket is made with mosaic crochet. you can join the **free cal starting january 1st, 2026 for 12 months** (releasing 1 pattern part per month). 
you can choose whether to make this pattern **regular or reversible overlay mosaic crochet** (video and photo tutorials for both techniques are provided). the pattern includes the written tutorial as well as the graph. the free cal only includes the regular overlay mosaic crochet pattern. *

**the pattern includes the written tutorial as well as the graph. pdf also includes the reversible pattern (written + graph) and 20 bonus images to swap images on the graph, as well as 8 stitch tutorials and 10 videos.**

--> **[join the free cal or get the pdf (more affordable) here][1]**
